softhardProductdetails.descriptionName: 25 cu. ft. Side-by-Side Refrigerator - Stainless Steel
softhardProductdetails.shortDescription:
Kenmore 25 cu. ft. Side-by-Side Refrigerator - Flexible Storage

This Kenmore side-by-side refrigerator 4115 offers adjustable shelves and large door bins to organize all your fresh and frozen groceries. Use the temperature-controlled bin to hold foods that keep well under slightly warmer temperatures, such as baby greens or cheese. This refrigerator also includes crisper bins, ideal for keeping produce fresh. In the freezer, you'll find in-door storage and several shelves, plus a pull-out bin. Complete with spill-proof shelves and LED lighting, this 25 cu. ft. side-by-side refrigerator provides flexible food storage options.
softhardProductdetails.longDescription:
• Adjusting to suit produce, desserts, meats, cheese and more, the temperature controlled convertible bin adapts to your grocery list with a quick swipe of the control.
  • Spacious, tight-sealing and designed to control humidity, Kenmore crisper drawers deliver fresh, crunchy fruit and vegetables, so you can stock up on produce.
  • Gallon door bins easily hold jugs, bottles and gallon containers to help clear the shelves and give you space to stock up.
  • Spill-proof tempered glass shelves keep drips, drizzles and spills from spreading throughout the fridge, making cleanup fast and easy.
  • Diamond LED lighting uses less space than incandescents while delivering the bright illumination you need.
